page.title: 02MY DAD'S JOB by Jane 11yrs
page.content: My dad travels as part of his job. He has been to many different countries and has just returned from an exhibition in China. He has also visitedIndonesia, Singapore and Hong-Kong. He was away for 3 weeks. One of his favourite countries is Germany. He does not like the Middle or Far East. For longer journies he travels by air but often goes by car to Europe. Although he likes travelling abroad he is always glad to get back to England It is over 15hrs on the plane from China to England. Some people think that it's lovely to go to lots of different countries but it is not because when you are working you cannot go sight-seeing. E
